messages.subject: Re: adverts on our site...selling computers
messages.msgSnippet: I never know until they send the first piece of spam.  We all know now; I ll be writing the author!  :) Lisa ... From: Campbell & Wyman  To:
messages.messageBody:
I never know until they send the first piece of spam. We all know now;
I'll be writing the author! :)

Lisa
----- Original Message -----
From: Campbell & Wyman <brynlee@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 11:47 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] adverts on our site...selling computers


> From: Campbell & Wyman <brynlee@...>
>
> EEEEk!!! How did we start getting adverts selling us Pentium computers
> (Subject:Free loaded Althon...etc) on our beloved unschooling chat line???
> Is there any screening or what is going on??
>
> Lisa? Do you know anything about this??
>
> Ta, Brooke in BC
> brynlee@...

messages.messageBody:
EEEEk!!! How did we start getting adverts selling us Pentium computers
(Subject:Free loaded Althon...etc) on our beloved unschooling chat line???
Is there any screening or what is going on??

Lisa? Do you know anything about this??

Ta, Brooke in BC
